guides.title: Aircraft parts
guides.strapline: Get help to classify drones and aircraft parts for import and export.

guides.title: Computers and software
guides.strapline: Get help classifying computers, inkjet and toner cartridges and their components.

guides.title: Electrical equipment for import and export
guides.strapline: Get help to classify electrical equipment such as communication equipment, cameras, and their parts and accessories.

guides.title: Ceramics
guides.strapline: Get help to classify ceramic articles for import and export.

guides.title: Edible fruits, nuts and peel
guides.strapline: Get help to classify edible vegetables, roots, tubers, herbs, spices, fruit, nuts and peel for import and export.

guides.title: Edible vegetables, roots and tubers
guides.strapline: Get help to classify edible vegetables, roots, tubers, herbs, spices, fruit, nuts and peel for import and export.

guides.title: Electric lamps
guides.strapline: Get help to classify electric lamps for import and export.

guides.title: Footwear
guides.strapline: Get help to classify footwear and parts of footwear for import and export.

guides.title: Herbal medicines, tonics and supplements
guides.strapline: Get help to classify herbal medicines, vitamins, food preparations, supplements and tonics for import and export.

guides.title: Iron and steel
guides.strapline: Get help to classify various items of iron and steel, primarily those classified under chapter 72.

guides.title: Leather
guides.strapline: Get help to classify articles of leather and other items in chapter 42 of the tariff for import and export.

guides.title: Monitors
guides.strapline: Get help to classify electrical equipment such as communication equipment, cameras, and their parts and accessories.

guides.title: Organic chemicals
guides.strapline: Get help to classify organic chemicals that contain certain permitted additives or can be dissolved in water, for import and export.

guides.title: Pharmaceutical products
guides.strapline: Get help to classify pharmaceutical products used to treat or prevent diseases or ailments (in humans or animals), including comparators used in clinical trials and placebos.

guides.title: Placebos and comparators
guides.strapline: Get help to classify pharmaceutical products used to treat or prevent diseases or ailments (in humans or animals), including comparators used in clinical trials and placebos.

guides.title: Plastics
guides.strapline: Get help to classify plastics for import and export.

guides.title: Rice
guides.strapline: Get help to classify rice and related products for direct human consumption for import and export.

guides.title: Textiles and textile articles
guides.strapline: Get help to classify textiles and which headings and codes to use.

guides.title: Tobacco and manufactured tobacco substitutes
guides.strapline: Get help to classify cigarettes, cigars, raw tobacco, smoking tobacco, tobacco for heating and nicotine substitutes for import and export.

guides.title: Toys, games and sports equipment
guides.strapline: Get help to classify various toys, games and festive articles for import and export.

guides.title: Vehicles, parts and accessories
guides.strapline: Get help to classify various types of vehicles such as mobility scooters, dumpers and utility vehicles, all-terrain vehicles and E-Bikes for import and export.

guides.title: Wood
guides.strapline: Get help to classify various types of wood for import and export.

guides.title: Fish
guides.strapline: Importing or moving live fish and shellfish
